directions.step:
Hi all, here's a recipe I just tried for baked catfish. I hope you enjoy this easy & tasty recipe.
Clean fish and lay in a baking dish. Pour Italian dressing over top of fish. (As much as you like). Sprinkle bread crumbs over fish. (I sprinkled Old bay seasoning over bread crumbs). Marinate for half-hour. Bake at 450 degrees for 20 minutes.
EAT-L DIGEST 10 JUNE 1996
From the EAT-L recipe list. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
